alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 7:53PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nassau and central Duval Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 752 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Oceanway, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph, frequent lightning, and heavy rainfall. A flood warning also remains in effect for parts of Duval county. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Arlington, Yulee, Cisco Gardens, Ortega, Oceanway, Normandy, San Marco and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval
